DOC.brief_summary: An observatory of patients registered in 22 local homecare associations in France, for respiratory diseases, with annual data update. Demographic and clinical data are registered rendering possible extraction of clinical and prognostic data.
DOC.brief_title: Database of Patients Treated With Respiratory Support
DOC.detailed_description: Patients on treatment for respiratory failure and for sleep apnoea are registered on entry into treatment with recording of clincal and demographic data. Data available on age, sex, region, respiratoy function, blood gases, smoking status and some bilogical data
